name: admin.conversations.invite
desc: Invite a user to a public or private channel.

channel_id.desc: The channel that the users will be invited to.

errors.channel_not_found: The value passed for `channel_id` was invalid.
errors.channel_type_not_supported: The provided `channel_id` was a DM, MPDM, or the 'general' channel.
errors.default_org_wide_channel: Users may not be invited to the default org-wide channel.
errors.failed_for_some_users: The method failed for a subset of the users passed.
errors.feature_not_enabled: The token provided doesn't have access to this method.
errors.restricted_action: A workspace preference prevents the authenticated user from inviting.
errors.user_must_be_admin: The token provided must be associated with an Org Admin or Owner.
